original_text: He removed the high places and incense altars in every town in Judah, and the kingdom was at peace under him.
korean_text: 또 유다 모든 성읍에서 산당과 태양상을 없애매 나라가 그 앞에서 평안함을 누리니라

sentences.original_text: and incense altars in every town in Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 모든 성읍에서 분향하는 단들을 제거하였으며

sentences.original_text: and the kingdom was at peace under him
